title: Milo the Brave Little Mouse
hook: What will happen when Milo must find a way to rescue the King of the Forest?
moral: You can help others when they are in need, no matter how small you may be.
paragraphs: In the great Fora jungle, lived Milo, a brave little mouse loved by all creatures for his courage. One day, the King of the Forest, a majestic lion, got trapped in a pit while on a stroll.
"Oh no! The King needs help," exclaimed Milo when he saw the situation. He knew he had to do something. The other animals were too big and scared to jump in and help the lion out.

"I will go down the pit and try to lift the King out," declared Milo with determination. He held onto a vine and went down carefully. With all his might, Milo pushed the lion up until the King was able to climb out.

The King was grateful for Milo's bravery and quick thinking. He praised the little mouse in front of all the animals in the jungle. From that day on, Milo was known as a hero among all creatures big and small.

id-en.hook: What will happen when Milo must find a way to rescue the King of the Forest?
id-en.moral: You can help others when they are in need, no matter how small you may be.
id-en.title: Milo the Brave Little Mouse
paragraphs:
In the big jungle of Fora, there was Milo, a small and brave mouse that everyone loved because he was so brave. One day, the King of the Forest, a big lion, got stuck in a hole while walking.
Oh dear! The King is in trouble," cried Milo when he saw what was happening. He knew he had to take action. The other animals were big and afraid to join him in rescuing the lion.
Milo said, "I'll go into the deep hole and help the King up." He grabbed a plant and descended slowly. With all his strength, Milo pushed the lion up so the King could come out.
The King was happy because Milo was very brave and very clever. He told all the animals in the jungle that Milo is a little mouse hero. Since that day, Milo was a hero for everyone, big or small.

en-de.title: Milo, die Mutige Kleine Maus
en-de.moral: Du kannst anderen helfen, wenn sie Hilfe brauchen, egal wie klein du bist.
en-de.hook: Was wird passieren, wenn Milo einen Weg finden muss, um den König des Waldes zu retten?
paragraphs:
In dem großen Fora-Dschungel lebte Milo, eine mutige kleine Maus, die von allen Kreaturen für ihren Mut geliebt wurde. Eines Tages, der König des Waldes, ein majestätischer Löwe, wurde in einer Grube gefangen, während er spazieren ging.
"Oh nein! Der König braucht Hilfe," rief Milo aus, als er die Situation sah. Er wusste, dass er etwas tun musste. Die anderen Tiere waren zu groß und ängstlich, um zu springen und dem Löwen zu helfen.
"Ich werde in die Grube hinuntergehen und versuchen, den König herauszuziehen," erklärte Milo mit Entschlossenheit. Er hielt sich an einer Rebe fest und stieg vorsichtig hinab. Mit aller Kraft drückte Milo den Löwen nach oben, bis der König herausklettern konnte.
Der König war dankbar für Milo's Tapferkeit und schnelles Denken. Er lobte die kleine Maus vor allen Tieren im Dschungel. Seit diesem Tag war Milo ein Held bekannt unter allen großen und kleinen Kreaturen.

en-pt.title: Milo o Corajoso Ratinho
en-pt.moral: Você pode ajudar os outros quando eles precisam, não importa o quão pequeno você seja.
en-pt.hook: O que vai acontecer quando Milo precisa encontrar um jeito de salvar o Rei da Floresta?
paragraphs:
Na grande selva de Fora, vivia Milo, um ratinho corajoso muito amado por todos os animais por sua valentia. Um dia, o Rei da Floresta, um leão majestoso, ficou preso em um buraco enquanto caminhava.
"Ai, ai! O Rei precisa de ajuda," exclamou Milo quando viu a situação. Ele sabia que tinha que fazer algo. Os outros animais eram muito grandes e assustados para pular e ajudar o leão.
"Eu vou descer no buraco e tentar levantar o Rei," declarou Milo com determinação. Ele segurou em uma videira e desceu cuidadosamente. Com toda a sua força, Milo empurrou o leão para cima até que o Rei pudesse sair.
O Rei ficou muito feliz com a coragem e a inteligência rápida do Milo. Ele elogiou o ratinho na frente de todos os animais na selva. A partir desse dia, o Milo ficou conhecido como um herói entre todas as criaturas, grandes e pequenas.

en-fr.title: Milo la Petite Souris Courageuse
en-fr.hook: Que se passera-t-il quand Milo devra trouver un moyen de secourir le Roi de la Forêt?
en-fr.moral: Tu peux aider les autres quand ils ont besoin, peu importe ta taille.
paragraphs:
Dans la grande jungle de Fora, vivait Milo, une petite souris courageuse aimée de toutes les créatures pour son courage. Un jour, le Roi de la Forêt, un lion majestueux, s'est retrouvé coincé dans un trou lors d'une promenade.
"Oh la la! Le Roi a besoin d'aide," s'écria Milo quand il vit la situation. Il savait qu'il devait faire quelque chose. Les autres animaux étaient trop grands et effrayés pour sauter et aider le lion.
"Je vais descendre dans le trou et essayer de sortir le Roi," déclara Milo avec détermination. Il se tint à une vigne et descendit prudemment. De toutes ses forces, Milo poussa le lion jusqu'à ce que le Roi puisse sortir.
Le Roi était reconnaissant pour le courage et la rapidité de réflexion de Milo. Il a loué la petite souris devant tous les animaux dans la jungle. Depuis ce jour, Milo était connu comme un héros parmi toutes les créatures grandes et petites.
